Document and publish R data package jmpinput. Goal: Make data readily accessible to enable researchers and practitioners to utilize powerful data. Write up documentation that describes the origin of data and structure that it is provided in. Prepare at least two use cases as "vignettes" that can be published together with the data. Publish data, documentation and "vignettes" as R Package.

Prepare and document R software Package jmpinput. Goal: Develop open-source software to support transparent documentation of modelling activities for primary indicators. Work with the JMP team replicate production of the basic indicators for individual countries, areas and territories, drawing on the data inputs described in WP1. Prepare a set of R functions that achieve all necessary data manipulation, modelling and visualization steps. Write up complete documentation for developed R functions. Publish R functions as a complete piece of software as an R Package.

Continuously check-in with JMP team to update on progress and share intermediate products for review. Publish well documented Open Educational Resources from an online workshop for researchers in our network to be used in their own teaching activities. Prepare an article for the Journal of Open Source Software.
